702147f-a.title: Bronx: White Plains Road - Thwaites Place
702147f-a.text:
White Plains Road (foreground), at the N.W. corner of Thwaites
Place. Ihe two story frame house, on the extreme right, bears No. 2241.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
702147f-a.folder: White Plains Road & Thwaites Place, Bronx, NY

701616f-a.title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway North - White Plains Road
701616f-a.text:
Pelham Parkway North, west from White Plains Road. The 5-story
apartment house, in the background, bears No. 615 and is between
Barker Ave. and Bronx Park East.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
701616f-a.folder: Pelham Parkway North & White Plains Road, Bronx, NY

700545f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Thwaites Place
700545f-a.text:
Boston Road, north from Thwaites Place. Intersecting Boston Road
is White Plains Road on which appears the elevated structure of the
I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line.
1917.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
700545f-a.folder: Boston Road & Thwaites Place, Bronx, NY
